## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                      | Type                | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------ | ------------------- | ------- |
| `position` | `position` | This attribute specify the position of the item. | `"bottom" \| "top"` | `'top'` |
| `text`     | `text`     | This attribute specify the text of the item.     | `string`            | `''`    |
